casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Franklin HURT. No. 192A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2006. Lisa Bradley Dawson, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney Generals, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hurt.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of October 2006 by Attorney General for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2006."
